text: “Fhe Bakɨme, ana Kama bavira ki. Ana guigira wo ndavar kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ga nɨɨŋgiap, ana ne nzuav mba Kama bavira, ana anan mbe nɨɨŋgi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgim, mba ana khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe fhɨrgi rɨgɨp vhɨzgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigirga.
